Name: Super Armor Boost
Des: Grants Super Armor to team members

Name: HP Boost II
Des: HP of all team members increases by 5,000

Name: Damage Boost II
Des: ATK of team members increases by 80%

Name: DMG Reduction I
Des: Extra DMG Reduction of all members increases by 30%

Name: Signal Amplifier III
Des: Gain 3 random Signal Orbs in every 10s.

Name: QTE Synergy
Des: Triggering a QTE by a 3-Ping will trigger another character's QTE

Name: QTE Heal
Des: After triggering a QTE, heals 15% of the current character's max HP
